pageContent: Purpose: Compared to urban populations, rural populations rank poorly on numerous health indicators, including cancer outcomes. We examined the relationship of rural residence with stage and treatment among patients with prostate cancer, the second most common malignancy in men.

metaData.source:
Estimating the cost of caring for people with cancer at the end of life: A modelling study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26199134/
